Uses of Package
marytts.htsengine

Packages that use marytts.htsengine

marytts.modules All the modules doing the actual processing. 
marytts.vocalizations   
 

Classes in marytts.htsengine used by marytts.cart.io
PhoneTranslator
          Translates phone names used in HTS-HTK
 

Classes in marytts.htsengine used by marytts.htsengine
CartTreeSet
          Set of CART trees used in HMM synthesis.
GVModelSet
          Set of Global Mean and (diagonal) Variance for log f0, mel-cepstrum, bandpass voicing strengths and Fourier magnitudes (the signal processing part of Fourier magnitudes is not implemented yet).
HMMData
          Configuration files and global variables for HTS engine.
HTSEngineTest.PhonemeDuration
           
HTSModel
          HMM model for a particular phone (or line in context feature file) This model is the unit when building a utterance model sequence.
HTSParameterGeneration
          Parameter generation out of trained HMMs.
HTSPStream
          Data type and procedures used in parameter generation.
HTSUttModel
          list of Model objects for current utterance.
HTSVocoder.HTSVocoderDataProducer
           
 

Classes in marytts.htsengine used by marytts.modules
HMMData
          Configuration files and global variables for HTS engine.
HTSEngineTest.PhonemeDuration
           
HTSUttModel
          list of Model objects for current utterance.
 

Classes in marytts.htsengine used by marytts.vocalizations
HMMData
          Configuration files and global variables for HTS engine.
HTSVocoder
          Synthesis of speech out of speech parameters.
